## graphikctl edit doc

edit a document

```
graphikctl edit doc [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --attributes string   json attributes of the doc
      --gid string          the gid of the doc
      --gtype string        the gtype of the doc
  -h, --help                help for doc
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.graphikctl.yaml)
```
